mapper.insert: INSERT INTO usercate(usercateno, name, seqno, visible, rdate) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(usercateno), 0) + 1 as usercateno FROM usercate), #{name}, #{seqno}, #{visible}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT usercateno, name, seqno, visible, TO_CHAR(rdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mi:ss') as rdate, cnt FROM usercate ORDER BY seqno ASC
